answers.answer: HiPain in the head and neck can have several causes like bad posture leading to loss of curvature, high blood pressure, degenerative diseases like neck arthritis, cervical spondylosis, ankylosing spondylosis, spinal stenosis, spondylolisthesis; migraine, tension headaches and cluster headaches, temporal arteritis, brain tumors, strokes, meningitis etc.The exact diagnosis depends on any associated symptoms like visual disturbance, nausea, vomit or neurological disturbances as well as any past medical history of raised cholesterol, raised BP, diabetes, or any other medical problems.You should consult a neurologist for a complete neurological and radiological examination. The exact diagnosis can be made through MRI or CT scan and physical exam. The treatment will usually depend on the cause and on the symptoms.Take care.
